Name: Shaken, Not Purred
Title: Diona: Shaken, Not Purred
Desc: Shake and stir till its all evenly mixed... and there! Your refill's ready!
Source: Reward for inviting Diona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Shaken, Not Purred
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1102]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1102] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11022]</color> once.
When your $[A1102], who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111021]</color>, its $[K6] points +1.
(You must have $[A1102] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C111021.Name: Cat-Claw Shield
C111021.Desc: Grants <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K6] point</color> for your active character.

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
